director.name: 德莫尔热·布朗 DeMorge Brown

introduction: Surrealism / Comedy / ExtensionalA New Orleans entertainer performs a bizarre solo talk show in his bathroom mirror.::At the height of covid we wanted to make something but didn’t want to risk anyone’s health, this was easy and done as remotely as possible.::Susan wrote the script, DeMorge and Ryan shot and edited it and then Darren wrote the score from New York. No more than two people were ever in a room together since we made this in July, 2020 when covid was raging.::Connect with the filmmakers:instagram:@astupidstupidman, @Burkeatrontwitter: @leitoPreto, @Thatsusanburkefacebook: Leite Preto
